Description: Marl pottery jar of squat globular shape, with rounded base, everted ledge rim, two short cylindrical handles on the shoulder. Exterior decorated in dark red-brown paint with large spirals and two wavy lines on the base, with wavy lines also over and around the handles.
Curator's comments: Most similar to D67j in Petrie’s Corpus of Prehistoric Pottery.
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir William Matthew Flinders Petrie
